ingredients: 1 tsp Fine Herbs or Parsley, dried
2 Tbsps crumbled feta cheese, or to taste
steps: Place couscous in a heat-proof mixing bowl. Add salt, pepper, cayenne, and olive oil; stir with a spoon until all couscous is coated with oil. Level off to smooth the top and set aside
Prep the vegetables, spices, and broth and set aside
Cube chicken then season with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and sear for 2 to 3 minutes on one side. Flip, add onions, and then continue to sear until cooked.
Top the couscous with the chicken and onions
Add broth, remaining diced vegetables, and spices to the saucepan. Place over high heat and as soon as it boils, pour over the couscous and cover; do not stir. Set a timer for five minutes
Add the fine herbs and serve garnished with feta, chili flakes, and fine herbs/parsley
title: Quick Chicken Couscous
